TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Net.IPEndPoint BindIPEndPoint(ServicePoint servicePoint, IPEndPoint remoteEndPoint, int retryCount);
.class public auto ansi sealed BindIPEndPoint extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function BindIPEndPoint(servicePoint As ServicePoint, remoteEndPoint As IPEndPoint, retryCount As Integer) As IPEndPoint
public delegate System::Net::IPEndPoint ^ BindIPEndPoint(ServicePoint ^ servicePoint, IPEndPoint ^ remoteEndPoint, int retryCount);
type BindIPEndPoint = delegate of ServicePoint * IPEndPoint * int -> IPEndPoint

Docs.param: 與所要建立之連線關聯的 。
為指定連線呼叫這個委派的次數。
Docs.summary: 表示指定 之本機網際網路通訊協定位址和連接埠編號的方法。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 指定<xref:System.Net.BindIPEndPoint>藉由使用委派<xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>藉由設定<xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.BindIPEndPointDelegate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性做為引數的委派。 這個委派應該指定在傳回的本機 IP 位址和連接埠號碼<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>。
如果.NET Framework 不繫結傳回<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>要<xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>之後<xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>嘗試<xref:System.OverflowException>就會擲回。
如果您想要讓連接繫結的服務點控制的委派，委派應傳回`null`。 如果您想要中止連接，該委派必須擲回例外狀況。
